name: Quad Hopping
description: The simplest puzzle game is the reaction and the ability to make quick decisions. As we move, we score points and the game gradually accelerates, it is already harder to catch up on the cherished platform to jump even further, to a greater result.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Xp Processor: DualCore CPU Graphics: Intel HD 2000 or equivalent Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Storage: 200 MB available space
